original_text: or anything about which he has sworn falsely, he shall restore it in full and shall add a fifth to it, and give it to him to whom it belongs on the day he realizes his guilt.
korean_text: 그 거짓 맹세한 모든 물건을 돌려보내되 곧 그 본래 물건에 오분의 일을 더하여 돌려보낼 것이니 그 죄가 드러나는 날에 그 임자에게 줄 것이요

sentences.original_text: or anything about which he has sworn falsely
sentences.korean_translation: 혹은 그가 거짓으로 맹세한 것에 대하여든지

sentences.original_text: he shall restore it in full
and shall add a fifth to it
sentences.korean_translation: 그것에 그 오분의 일을 더해야 하며

sentences.original_text: and give it to him to whom it belongs
on the day he realizes his guilt
